channel.title: Logo
channel.description:
I made a new intro for my fictional company and I'm asking for opinions and mostly, what could be done better, because I'm not satisfied with the result. The improvements need to be reasonable and the main concept needs to stay the same.
Also, report if you're getting lagg when viewing the logo.
After the logo finishes loading, hit Play Game and it will play the logo again.
[url=http://vreg.comli.com/Vreggie%20Fish%20Plus.html]http://vreg.comli.com/Vreggie%20Fish%20Plus.html[/url]

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

The spelling mistake is fixed but I have no reason to upload an upgraded version.

The game is playable, but I’m not going to release it until after it gets sold. This is due to production value, if a sponsor finds the game and is able to play it, he’ll offer a lot less money than the other way around.

I already made an intro, B2300 T4nk, but I can imagine that a logo will be required in the future (ex. a website, iTunes,…) so if you want to make me one, go ahead. But, you should know that I will only be using it if it’s really good. I don’t like to be mean or selfish but this is a professional situation where I need a quality logo. If you know it’s not going to be something really cool they you might aswell not start making it.

The mountain is a requirement for the logo, what I had in mind was a simple logo, not to complicated, but with the mountain.

The mountain does not need to be a picture of the real mountain, it can be a simple drawing like this:

But it has to be based on the real mountain:

Again, you don’t have to make me one, but if you really want to make one and you got the skills, then I’m not stopping you.

I am grateful in any case though and appreciate your offer.

EDIT: for the dimensions I’d say 1920 x 1080.

Read full topic

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:18, topic:424247”]The intro is much better than it was before, nice job. And the buttons, good work. Personally I don’t really like the whole Armenian flag as a button background concept, (you dont really see US flags as button backgrounds), unless that’s the purpose of the game? What type of game is it? The theme just doesn’t fit it.[/quote]It’s just Armenian pride =). The game’s theme is kindoff complicated to explain, but let’s keep it at an under water first person fish shooter third person fish game. It’s a stupid flash game, nothing big, just 20 minutes of entertainment.

My main purpose for this game is money, so I’m not doing this for fun. I need a budget for a larger project I planned.

Anyway, thanks to everyone for their opinions!

Read full topic

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The intro is much better than it was before, nice job. And the buttons, good work. Personally I don’t really like the whole Armenian flag as a button background concept, (you dont really see US flags as button backgrounds), unless that’s the purpose of the game? What type of game is it? The theme just doesn’t fit it.

Read full topic

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:16, topic:424247”]Why do you want a mountain?[/quote]The mountain Ararat is Armenia’s symbol. So I want it in my logo, anyhow, I finished making something simple and thus have no need for another logo.

Thanks for the offer.

I’ll upload the new logo in a sec for those who are interested. It’s actually an intro, not a logo.

Free Web Hosting

Free Web Hosting - Your Website need to be migrated

Absolutely Free Web Hosting with PHP, MySQL, cPanel and no Ads!

Update log:

  • Fixed the buttons and made them better. (thanks to David)
  • Made a new laggless intro that to me is much better.
  • Not switching from Flash, don’t judge what you don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Logo
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:424247”]1. Does it have to be that background? It really doesn’t fit.
2. When you hover over a button, it turns into that rainbow theme. When you then move the mouse AWAY from the button, it fades back to normal. Right at the end of the ‘fade’, it flashes. I don’t know how else to explain it. :[/quote]Oh, I know what you mean, I didn’t think anyone would notice that, but it’s fixable.
Anyway, I think I’m going to completely remake the intro. Thanks for the feedback guys.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:4, topic:424247”]In the How To Play interface, you wrote Pauze.[/quote]Thanks for that one!

Anyway, I need opinions and improvements on the logo, ANYONE?

My baby brother told me it’s shit, my friend told me it’s awesome. So I’m quite confused. I’m in a hurry to finish this project so I’m not planning to make some GIANT fucked up awesome logo.
